metadata.creator: Ruben Schade
metadata.description:
28:38 – A somewhat sleep-deprived ramble into promises, fascinating accents and creoles, the wondrous benefits of rampling, recordings for other shows, moving in with significant others, introversion, and FINALLY timing a DHL sign.

Recorded in Sydney, Australia. Licence for this track: Creative Commons Attribution 3.0. Attribution: Ruben Schade.

Released September 2016 on Rubénerd and The Overnightscape Underground, an Internet talk radio channel focusing on a freeform monologue style, with diverse and fascinating hosts (this one notwithstanding).

Subscribe with iTunes, Pocket Casts, Overcast or add this feed to your podcast client.

Special thanks to the Internet Archive; their generous hosting makes this show possible.

metadata.title: Rubénerd Show 351: The minty creole episode
